sentences.sContent: plants that thrive in tropical rain forests
sentences.sCn: 在热带雨林蓬勃生长的植物

sentences.sContent: a business which managed to thrive during a recession
sentences.sCn: 在经济萧条时期也能顺利发展的一家企业

sentences.sContent: ...and the multitudes of insects that thrive on the dumps...
...analytic reasoning and other higher-level skills that are necessary to thrive in today's knowledge-based economy and to lead our nation in a time of complex challenges and dynamic change...
...I would not have believed that people who had been so broken and stuck in homelessness could thrive to the degree that they do in our buildings...
...Organizations cannot thrive without being focused on their desired end results any more than an individual can thrive without goals to provide a sense of purpose...

remMethod.val: th ＋ rive(看作river， 河) → 繁荣的古文明都起源于几大流域 → 繁荣

words.tran: 繁荣的；蒸蒸日上的；旺盛的

trans.tranOther: to become very successful or very strong and healthy
